headline: American Water Charitable Foundation & Illinois American Water Launch Inaugural Hydration Station Grant Program
summary: BELLEVILLE, Ill., May 27, 2025--The Hydration Station Grant Program aims to boost trust in tap water and reduce plastic waste by providing hydration options in public spaces.
